Cookbook
========

Create point plot where size of each point reflects proportion of members within the group
```{r}
ggplot(wide_df, aes(factor(dm), scu_days)) + 
  stat_sum(aes(group=scu_days))
```


library(ggplot2)
ggplot(wide_df, aes(scu_days)) +
  geom_histogram()

wide_df$in_scu <- wide_df$scu_days > 0

ggplot(wide_df, aes(factor(in_scu), rsi_inhosp)) + 
  geom_boxplot(aes(fill = in_scu)) +
  theme(legend.position = "none")

ggplot(wide_df, aes(scu_days, rsi_inhosp)) + 
  geom_point()


ggplot(wide_df, aes(rsi_inhosp, index)) + 
  geom_point() + geom_smooth(method=lm)
```
